trans-unit.source: Enables access to ASP.NET forms authentication as a Web service.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer tilgang til ASP.NET skjemagodkjenning som en webtjeneste.

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationService object enables you to authenticate users through a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: Objektet AuthenticationService gjør det mulig å godkjenne brukere via en [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: You use the WCF authentication service when you must authenticate users through ASP.NET membership from an application that is outside the Web application that stores the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker WCF godkjenningstjenesten når må du godkjenne brukere via ASP.NET-medlemskap fra et program som er utenfor webprogram som lagrer brukerlegitimasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The application must be able to send and consume message in the SOAP format.
trans-unit.target: Programmet må kunne sende og bruke melding i SOAP-format.

trans-unit.source: Through the AuthenticationService class, you can log users in, log users out, validate credentials, check authentication status, customize authentication, and set the authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Via klassen AuthenticationService, kan du logge brukere, logge brukere, validere legitimasjon, Kontroller statusen for godkjenning, tilpasse godkjenning, og angi informasjonskapselen for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationService class contains four methods that you should access only through a WCF service: the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.IsLoggedIn%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Logout%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AuthenticationService inneholder fire metoder som du skal få tilgang til bare via en WCF-tjenesten: den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.IsLoggedIn%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Logout%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Logout%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.IsLoggedIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: To call these methods, you enable the authentication service on a Web server and then connect a WCF-compatible client application to the Web service.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil kalle disse metodene, aktivere godkjenningstjenesten på en nettserver og koble deretter et klientprogram WCF-kompatibelt med webtjenesten.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure the authentication service, see [How to: Enable the WCF Authentication Service](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer godkjenningstjenesten [slik: aktivere godkjenningstjenesten WCF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To log users on, you pass the user credentials to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Påloggingsinformasjon brukere, kan du sende brukerlegitimasjonen til den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the credentials are valid, the AuthenticationService class creates an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Hvis legitimasjonen er gyldig, oppretter klassen AuthenticationService en informasjonskapsel for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: If the authentication cookie has not expired, you know that the user's credentials have been authenticated and you do not have to validate the credentials again.
trans-unit.target: Hvis informasjonskapselen for godkjenning ikke er utløpt, vet du at brukerens legitimasjon er godkjent, og du har ikke bekrefte legitimasjonen på nytt.

trans-unit.source: (Cookie-less authentication is not available through the AuthenticationService class.) The AuthenticationService can raise two events: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>.
trans-unit.target: (Informasjonskapsel mindre godkjenning er ikke tilgjengelig via AuthenticationService-klassen.) AuthenticationService kan øke to hendelser: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>og <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event occurs when the user credentials are being validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelsen oppstår når brukerlegitimasjonen valideres.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event to customize how user credentials are validated.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>-hendelsen for å tilpasse hvordan brukerlegitimasjonen er validert.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event occurs when the authentication cookie is being set after user credentials have been validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>hendelsen oppstår når informasjonskapselen for godkjenning som angis etter at brukerlegitimasjonen er blitt godkjent.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event to customize the authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>-hendelsen for å tilpasse informasjonskapselen for godkjenning.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A> method checks user credentials for authentication, but it does not return an authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A>metoden kontrollerer brukerlegitimasjon for godkjenning, men returnerer ikke en godkjenningsbillett.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A> when a user has previously logged in and you must check that the credentials are still valid at the start of a new application session.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A>når en bruker tidligere har logget på, og må du kontrollere at legitimasjonen er fortsatt er gyldige ved starten av en ny applikasjon-økt.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the WCF authentication service from a console application, see [Walkthrough: Using ASP.NET Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på ved hjelp av tjenesten WCF godkjenning fra en applikasjon i konsollen, kan du se [gjennomgang: ved hjelp av ASP.NET programtjenester](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when user credentials are being validated.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukerlegitimasjonen valideres.

trans-unit.source: The Authenticating event is raised when user credentials are being validated.
trans-unit.target: Authenticating denne hendelsen oppstår når brukerlegitimasjonen valideres.

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler for the Authenticating event to customize how user credentials are validated.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en hendelsesbehandling for hendelsen Authenticating tilpasse hvordan brukerlegitimasjonen er validert.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the authentication cookie is being set.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når godkjenning informasjonskapselen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The CreatingCookie event is raised when the authentication cookie is being set after user credentials have been validated.
trans-unit.target: CreatingCookie denne hendelsen oppstår når informasjonskapselen for godkjenning som angis etter at brukerlegitimasjonen er blitt godkjent.

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler for the CreatingCookie event to customize the authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en hendelsesbehandling for hendelsen CreatingCookie tilpasse informasjonskapselen for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den gjeldende brukeren er godkjent.

trans-unit.source: The IsLoggedIn method checks whether the current user is authenticated by checking the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity.IsAuthenticated%2A>.property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IsLoggedIn kontrollerer om den gjeldende brukeren er godkjent ved å kontrollere de <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity.IsAuthenticated%2A>.property.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity.IsAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not call the IsLoggedIn method from code that is executing on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke kalle metoden IsLoggedIn fra kode som kjører på nettserveren.

trans-unit.source: You call the IsLoggedIn method only as part of a WCF service.
trans-unit.target: Du kalle metoden IsLoggedIn bare som en del av en WCF-tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user has been authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren er godkjent; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Checks user credentials and creates an authentication ticket (cookie) if the credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer bruker legitimasjon og oppretter en godkjenningsbillett (cookie) hvis legitimasjonen er gyldig.

trans-unit.source: The Login method validates user credentials through a membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Metoden påloggingen validerer brukerlegitimasjonen via en leverandør av medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: You can use the default membership provider or specify a custom membership provider at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke medlemskap standardleverandøren eller angi en egendefinert medlemskapsleverandør på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class passes `userName` and `password` to the membership provider's <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method, but does not pass `customCredential`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klasse formidler `userName` og `password` til leverandøren av medlemskapet <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>metode, men ikke sende `customCredential`.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> returns `true`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> creates an authentication ticket as a cookie.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>returnerer `true`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>oppretter en godkjenningsbillett som en informasjonskapsel.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the `isPersistent` parameter to `true` to create an authentication ticket that lasts beyond the current session.
trans-unit.target: Angi den `isPersistent` parameter `true` til å opprette en godkjenningsbillett som varer utenfor økten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always use the authentication service together with the secure sockets layer (SSL, by using HTTPS) to protect sensitive data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid bruke godkjenningstjenesten sammen med secure sockets layer (SSL, ved å bruke HTTPS) til å beskytte sensitive data.

trans-unit.source: The Login method raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event and the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden påloggingen opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelsen og <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler for <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> to customize authentication, such as checking the values in `customCredential` or validating credentials through a non-default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en hendelsesbehandling for <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>tilpasse godkjenning, for eksempel kontrollerer verdiene `customCredential` eller validere legitimasjonen via en ikke-standard medlemskapsleverandør.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The values in `customCredential` are not validated by the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i `customCredential` ikke er godkjent av medlemskap standardleverandøren.

trans-unit.source: To customize the authentication cookie, create an event handler for <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse informasjonskapselen for godkjenning, oppretter du en hendelsesbehandling for <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not call the Login method from code that is executing on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke kalle metoden pålogging fra kode som kjører på nettserveren.

trans-unit.source: You call the Login method only as part of a WCF service.
trans-unit.target: Du kalle metoden påloggingen bare som en del av en WCF-tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET godkjenning](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The user name to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavnet for å validere.

trans-unit.source: The password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: Passordet for brukeren som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The value or values to validate in addition to `userName` and `password`, if any.
trans-unit.target: Verdien eller verdiene til å validere i tillegg til `userName` og `password`, hvis noen.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the authentication ticket remains valid across sessions.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om godkjenningsbilletten forblir gyldig på tvers av økter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if user credentials are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeropplysningene er gyldige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: userName or password is .
trans-unit.target: userNameor password is .

trans-unit.source: Clears the authentication ticket (cookie) in the browser.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner godkjenningsbilletten (cookie) i nettleseren.

trans-unit.source: The Logout method clears the authentication cookie from the browser's cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Avloggingsforespørsler tømmes informasjonskapselen for godkjenning fra leserens informasjonskapsel samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The user must log in again to be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren må logge på på nytt godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not store information on the server about which authentication tickets have been cleared.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen ikke lagre informasjonen på serveren som godkjenning billetter er fjernet.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not call the Logout method from code that is executing on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke kalle metoden Avloggingsforespørsler fra kode som kjører på nettserveren.

trans-unit.source: You call the Logout method only as part of a WCF service.
trans-unit.target: Du kalle metoden Avloggingsforespørsler bare som en del av en WCF-tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET godkjenning](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Authenticates user credentials without issuing an authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenner brukerlegitimasjonen uten utsteder en godkjenningsbillett.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateUser method authenticates the user credentials but does not set an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateUser godkjenner brukerlegitimasjonen, men angir ikke en informasjonskapsel for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: Without an authentication cookie, the user will not be logged in even if the credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Uten en informasjonskapsel for godkjenning vil brukeren ikke bli logget selv om legitimasjonen er gyldig.

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidateUser method when you must check whether a user's credentials are valid without receiving an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden ValidateUser når må du kontrollere om en brukeropplysningene er gyldige uten å motta en informasjonskapsel for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might do this if the authentication cookie is already stored in a client application but you want to verify that the user's credentials are still valid when a new session starts.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel gjøre dette hvis informasjonskapselen for godkjenning allerede er lagret i et klientprogram, men du ønsker å bekrefte at brukerens legitimasjon er fortsatt er gyldige når du starter en ny økt.

trans-unit.source: TheValidateUser method raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event, but does not raise the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event.
trans-unit.target: TheValidateUser metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelse, men ikke heve den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not call the ValidateUser method from code that is executing on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke kalle metoden ValidateUser fra kode som kjører på nettserveren.

trans-unit.source: You call the ValidateUser method only as part of a WCF service.
trans-unit.target: Du kalle metoden ValidateUser bare som en del av en WCF-tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET godkjenning](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The user name to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavnet for å validere.

trans-unit.source: The password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: Passordet for brukeren som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The value or values to validate in addition to `userName` and `password`, if any.
trans-unit.target: Verdien eller verdiene til å validere i tillegg til `userName` og `password`, hvis noen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeropplysningene er gyldige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: userName or password is .
trans-unit.target: userNameor password is .
